content.text: In the corner of your eye you see a red figure run by.^1500 It startles you, and you quickly whip around to look for it.^1500 Are you imagining things?^1500 You walk to where you saw the figure run by and look down the corridor.^1500 A tall red figure stares back at you from the end of the hall.^1500 He gestures for you to follow him.^1500 With every move he seems to glitch and jolt.
